preqs: It is recommended that students have completed at least three third year econometrics units.

rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course version {0024, 0091, 0181, 1034, D30032}

unitName: Special reading unit in econometrics honours
description: A unit of study in a special field of econometrics in which no formal unit is available. The supervisor will prescribe a list of references, consult frequently with the student and set whatever written work and examinations are deemed appropriate.
